properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) exhibitionListCount FROM CONTENTS WHERE CONTENT_TYPE = '전시' AND CONTENT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , P.* FROM ( SELECT CONTENT_NO --등록번호 , CONTENT_TITLE --작품제목 , CONTENT_KEYWORD --키워드 , REGION --지역 , CONTENT_CHIMG --이미지수정 , CONTENT_IMGPATH --파일경로 , PLAY_START , PLAY_END FROM CONTENTS JOIN PLAY USING (CONTENT_NO) WHERE CONTENT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CONTENT_NO DESC )P ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
